title: Photos: Dems in Vegas for their first debate
text: 11/15/10 20:26:31 14 Oct 2015 17:57 Photos: Dems in Vegas for their first debate USA Today Former Virginia senator Jim Webb, Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders, former U.S. secretary of State Hillary Clinton, former Maryland governor Martin O'Malley and former Rhode Island governor Lincoln Chafee Sanders gives Clinton a gift Fortune If you missed last night’s spirited Democratic debate, Bernie Sanders played foil to Hillary Clinton, in a way that we think works to her advantage . First, when debate moderator Anderson Cooper asked Obama's day: Meetings and a concert USA Today President Obama has another behind-the-scenes kind of day Wednesday, holding a series of meetings before ending the day with a White House concert. The meetings include a lunch with Vice President Biden. Dems go big on climate change, not on details MSNBC Democratic presidential candidates bet big on climate change at Tuesday night’s debate, presenting it as a matter of life-or-death for the planet, and – to judge by the frequency and passion with which 23 Hours ago 23 Hours ago Israel 'sets up Jerusalem checkpoints' Israeli forces have begun a major security operation in Arab areas of occupied East Jerusalem, after a surge in attacks by Palestinians. Police are blocking the entrances to the Jabal Mukaber, where Israel 'sets up Jerusalem checkpoints' Israeli security forces reportedly begin setting up checkpoints in Arab areas of occupied East Jerusalem, after a surge in attacks by Palestinians. Israel sets up East Jerusalem roadblocks in bid to stem attacks Reuters Palestinian protesters put out a fire burning on a compatriot, caused by a molotov cocktail which he was trying to hurl at Israeli troops during clashes in the West Bank city of Hebron, October 13, 2015. Israel Approves Sealing Off Jerusalem Arab Areas to Stem Attacks The Israeli government approved a series of security measures in an effort to stem a surge of attacks by Palestinians, including the potential sealing of Arab neighborhoods of Jerusalem.
